SQL.NAME: queryDm_bbidDAO
SQL.CLAUSE: select T.UUID, T.SWJG_DM, T.YYYF, to_char(T.JJRQSRQ,'yyyymmdd'), to_char(T.JJRZZRQ,'yyyymmdd'), T.LRRQ, T.XGRQ, T.XYBZ, T.JJRQSRQ from cs_gy_jjr t WHERE T.SWJG_DM in (select dm.swjg_dm from dm_gy_swjg dm where dm.swjgbz = '0' start with dm.swjg_dm = ? connect by prior dm.sjswjg_dm = dm.swjg_dm) AND T.YYYF = TO_CHAR(SYSDATE, 'YYYY-MM') AND T.XYBZ = 'Y' order by t.swjg_dm desc
